Text: tested and working on 32 bit xp in VMware. It is the Euro EPC.

@ctrpower... 

Are you able to upload EPC V18 yet? Cheers!

Perhaps should be noted this is for CARS? I d/l thinking it was the bike version :-(

Didn't install it.

Oh well.

EPC 17 needs clean install remove previous versions first

extract iso to a folder on your harddrive

edit honda.ini in the database folder change release date to 2050 (otherwise you'll have to set back system date to start epc)

run setup.exe

enter serial serial: SKHC95467

restart

enjoy...
